name: drainjs
description: It allows you to use methods such as where, limit, select, orderBy on JSON data.

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{ "module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register -r ignore-styles -r jsdom-global/register test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-windows: cross-env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{\"module\":\"commonjs\"}' mocha -r ts-node/register -r ignore-styles -r jsdom-global/register test/**/*.spec.ts

author: Aykut Karda≈ü
